articles.title: Trial over killing of HIV activist begins in Greece - manilastandard.net
articles.description: Three years after a prominent Greek-American HIV activist was beaten to death in Athens, six people will appear in court on Wednesday in what Greeces LGBTQ community sees as an important trial for gay rights in the country.
articles.content:
posted October 20, 2021 at 01:30 pm
 by AFP and Hélène Colliopoulou

articles.author: Madeline Holcombe, CNN
articles.title: ACLU sues Oklahoma over law prohibiting critical race theory topics from being taught in schools - CNN
articles.description: A group of students and educators has filed a complaint challenging an Oklahoma law that restricts teaching about race and gender, in what the American Civil Liberties Union calls the first federal lawsuit to challenge such a statewide ban.

articles.title: All Blacks hailed as 'world rugby's most famous club' by United States congressman - Stuff.co.nz
articles.description: A Republican congressman claims rugby is a 'fast-growing sport in America' with the potential to 'put partisan politics aside'.
